## Appendix A: True Model

For every individual i in i = 1,..., N:
$$Y_i \sim \mathcal{N}(\mathbf{0}, \Sigma),$$ where
$$\Sigma = \Lambda\Psi\Lambda',$$
$$\Lambda = 
    \begin{bmatrix}
    0.75 & 0 \\
    0.75 & 0 \\
    0.75 & 0.2/0.5 \\
    0.2/0.5 & 0.75 \\
    0 & 0.75 \\
    0 & 0.75
    \end{bmatrix},$$
$$\Psi =
    \begin{bmatrix}
     1 & 0.5 \\
     0.5 & 1
    \end{bmatrix}
,$$ and
$$\Theta = diag[0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3, 0.3].$$
